languages.text: События в Святилище Навигатора традиционно окутаны тайной во время варп-перелетов, однако передачи от досточтимой госпожи Орселлио в период возникновения фантомов навели особый страх на вокс-операторов. По их словам, голос Кассии изменился до неузнаваемости, став необычайно звонким и радостным. Один из радистов сообщил о загадочных переговорах в навигационной палате: Леди-Навигатор беззаботно болтала, предлагала "поиграть в саду" и весело смеялась. Другой радист уверял, что через пару часов после этого поймал в вокс-эфире горький женский плач.

Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognisably clear and cheerful. One of the radio operators reported strange conversations in the Sanctum where the Lady Navigator chattered happily, suggested they "play in the garden," and giggled. Several hours later another operator claimed he heard a woman weep bitterly over the vox-channel.

traits.locale_text: The tradition dictates that whatever happens in the navigation chambers during the voyage remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognizably clear and cheerful. One of the radio operators reported strange conversations in the navigation chamber where Lady Navigator chattered happily, suggested they "play in the garden" and giggled. Several hours later another radio operator claimed he heard a woman weep bitterly over the vox channel.

languages.text: 亚空间航行期间，导航者圣所中发生的事情一直是个谜团，但即便如此，但这场幻觉袭击事件中，尊贵的奥赛罗女士发来的信息还是吓坏了音阵操作员。据他们说，卡西娅的声音突然变得无比清晰、欢快，几乎难以辨认出是她的声音。其中一名音阵操作员还报告说，导航者圣所里传来了古怪的谈话声，导航者女士兴高采烈地和什么人闲聊着，还建议他们“到花园里玩”，随后咯咯笑了起来。几个小时后，另一名操作员声称，他通过音阵频道，听到某位女子在痛苦地哭泣。
languages.original_text: Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognisably clear and cheerful. One of the radio operators reported strange conversations in the Sanctum where the Lady Navigator chattered happily, suggested they "play in the garden," and giggled. Several hours later another operator claimed he heard a woman weep bitterly over the vox-channel.

languages.text: La tradición dicta que lo que ocurra en sanctum de Navegantes durante un salto de disformidad siga siendo un misterio, pero las transmisiones de la respetada Lady Orsellio durante el asalto de los fantasmas asustaron a los operadores de voco. Según ellos, la voz de Cassia se volvió irreconociblemente clara y alegre. Uno de los operadores de radio informó de extrañas conversaciones en el Sanctum de navegación en las que la Dama Navegante hablaba alegremente, sugería que «jugaran en el jardín» y soltaba risitas. Varias horas más tarde, otro operador afirmó haber oído a una mujer llorar amargamente por el canal voco.
languages.original_text: Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognisably clear and cheerful. One of the radio operators reported strange conversations in the Sanctum where the Lady Navigator chattered happily, suggested they "play in the garden," and giggled. Several hours later another operator claimed he heard a woman weep bitterly over the vox-channel.

languages.text: 過去の事例を考えると、ワープジャンプ中に航宙士のサンクトゥムで起こることは謎のままのはずが、尊敬するレディ・オーセリオの亡霊が襲撃中の通信内容に、ヴォクスオペレーターは震え上がった。その中では、カシアの声は本人と思えないほどハキハキと陽気に聞こえる。無線オペレーターのひとりから、レディ航宙士がサンクトゥムで楽し気におしゃべりながら「庭で遊ぼう」と提案して、くすくす笑っていたと報告があった。数時間後、別のオペレーターが、ヴォクスチャンネル越しに激しく泣く女性の声を聞いたと口にした。
languages.original_text: Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognisably clear and cheerful. languages.text: Selon la tradition, tout ce qui se passe dans le sanctum de navigation pendant un saut Warp doit rester confidentiel, mais les transmissions que la vénérable dame Orsellio a envoyées pendant l'attaque des chimères ont glacé le sang des opérateurs-vox. Ils rapportent que la voix de Cassia est devenue étonnamment claire et joyeuse. Un opérateur radio déclare même avoir entendu d'étranges conversations lors desquelles la dame navigatrice dialoguait joyeusement et proposait d'aller « jouer dans le jardin » en gloussant de bonheur. Plusieurs heures plus tard, un autre opérateur prétend avoir entendu une femme éclater en sanglots sur le canal-vox.
languages.original_text: Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. languages.text: Die Tradition verlangt, dass die Vorkommnisse im Navigator-Sanctum während eines Warpsprungs ein Geheimnis bleiben. Doch die Übertragungen der angesehenen Lady Orsellio während des Angriffs der Phantome haben dem Vox-Personal Angst gemacht. Sie sagen, dass Cassias Stimme so klar und fröhlich war, dass sie nicht zu erkennen war. Einer der Funker berichtet von merkwürdigen Unterhaltungen im Navigator-Sanctum, bei denen die Lady Navigator fröhlich vor sich hingeplappert und kichernd vorgeschlagen hat, dass sie "im Garten spielen gehen". Mehrere Stunden später sagte ein anderer Funker, er habe auf dem Vox-Kanal eine Frau bitterlich weinen hören.
languages.original_text: Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognisably clear and cheerful. One of the radio operators reported strange conversations in the Sanctum where the Lady Navigator chattered happily, suggested they "play in the garden," and giggled. Several hours later another operator claimed he heard a woman weep bitterly over the vox-channel.

traits.locale_text: Die Tradition verlangt, dass die Vorkommnisse in der Navigationskammer während eines Warpsprungs ein Geheimnis bleiben. Doch die Übertragungen der angesehenen Lady Orsellio während des Angriffs der Phantome haben dem Vox-Personal Angst gemacht. Sie sagen, dass Cassias Stimme so klar und fröhlich war, dass sie nicht zu erkennen war. Einer der Funker berichtet von merkwürdigen Unterhaltungen in der Navigationszentrale, bei denen die Lady Navigator fröhlich vor sich hingeplappert und kichernd vorgeschlagen hat, dass sie "im Garten spielen gehen". Mehrere Stunden später sagte ein anderer Funker, er habe auf dem Vox-Kanal eine Frau bitterlich weinen hören.

languages.text: Geleneklere göre öteboyut sıçraması sırasında Navis Kutağı'nda olanlar sır olarak kalır. Ancak hayaletlerin saldırısı sırasında saygıdeğer Leydi Orsellio'nun yaptığı voks yayınları, voks operatörlerini korkuttu. Operatörlere göre Cassia'nın sesi, tanınamayacak kadar net ve neşeliydi. Operatörlerden biri, Navis Kutağı'nda Leydi Rotacı'nın keyifle sohbet ettiğini, "bahçede oynamayı" teklif ettiğini ve kıkırdadığını duyduğunu bildirdi. Birkaç saat sonra başka bir operatör, voks kanalında bir kadının acıyla ağladığını duyduğunu söyledi.
languages.original_text: Tradition dictates that whatever happens in the Navigator's Sanctum during a warp jump remains a mystery, but the transmissions from the esteemed Lady Orsellio during the assault of the phantoms frightened vox operators. According to them, Cassia's voice became unrecognisably clear and cheerful. One of the radio operators reported strange conversations in the Sanctum where the Lady Navigator chattered happily, suggested they "play in the garden," and giggled. Several hours later another operator claimed he heard a woman weep bitterly over the vox-channel.
